summary: MY VEHICLE IS DOING THE EXACT SAME THING AS THIS RECALL #19S07 - 6R80 TRANSMISSION UNEXPECTED DOWNSHIFT INTO 1ST GEAR.    MY VIN SAYS THERE IS NO RECALL YET IT IS HAPPENING TO MY CAR ON A SEMI REGULAR BASIS 2-3 TIMES PER WEEK.   I DO NOT HAVE THE MONEY TO TAKE IT TO MY LOCAL FORD DEALER AND FEEL THIS VIN SHOULD BE RECALLED FOR THIS PROBLEM.        THE CAR JUST DROPS DOWN INTO 1ST GEAR IRREGARDLESS OF SPEED.  IT IS A DANGER TO MYSELF AND OTHER DRIVERS AROUND ME.       I AM WRITING THIS DESPERATE EMAIL TO NHTSA TO PLEASE PUT MY CAR ON THIS RECALL ASAP AND ALSO DOCUMENTING THE FACT I AM TELLING YOU ABOUT THIS PROBLEM IN CASE THERE IS A FUTURE ACCIDENT FOR INSURANCE PURPOSES AND A LAW SUIT WAITING TO HAPPEN.    PLEASE HELP ME.   THIS VEHICLE IS DANGEROUS AND NEEDS REPAIR TODAY.  I DO NOT HAVE THE MONEY TO TAKE IT TO FORD.   I KNOW WHAT EVER THE COSTS IT WILL BE 500-1000 OR MORE.       PLEASE RECHECK MY VIN: [XXX]    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
